messages.title: Putting Inverclyde first...
messages.content: This election...only Labour can stop the Tories in Inverclyde, which is why every vote for the SNP lets in the Tories by the back door.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proposal for a Future Jobs Guarantee to help give young people in Inverclyde a better start in the job market.
Commitment to securing a 24-hour GP service in Inverclyde.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election...only Labour can stop the Tories in Inverclyde, which is why every vote for the SNP lets in the Tories by the back door.

issues.economy: Future Jobs Guarantee as part of the proposal to help Inverclyde's economic situation.
issues.health: Commitment to fight for a 24-hour GP service in Inverclyde.
